# go(to:)

**Instance Method**

Scrolls to the specified page.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor func go(to page: PDFPage)
```

## Discussion

PDF Kit records the move in its page history.

## Using Seek in a Document

- **go(to:)**: Navigates to the specified destination.
- **go(to:)**: Scrolls to the first character of the specified selection.
- **go(to:on:)**: Navigates to the specified rectangle on the specified page.
